title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document all requirements for the PQRSTLearningAssistant tool, including user needs, functional requirements, non-functional requirements, and any constraints or assumptions.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the components, their interactions, and the technology stack to be used. Consider the following aspects: 1) User interface (web/mobile app) for uploading learning materials and interacting with the PQRST method. 2) Natural Language Processing (NLP) component for text analysis and summarization. 3) Database for storing user data, learning materials, and generated summaries. 4) Microservices architecture for scalability and maintainability. 5) Cloud deployment for easy scaling and availability. 6) Security considerations for handling user data. 7) Integration with third-party services (e.g., cloud storage, authentication providers).

title: Design User Interface
description: Design the user interface for the PQRSTLearningAssistant tool, including wireframes, mockups, and user experience considerations.

title: Develop Backend
description: Implement the backend components of the system, including the AI-powered learning assistant, data processing, and integration with other services.

title: Develop Frontend
description: Implement the frontend components of the system, including the user interface and integration with the backend.

title: Set up Testing Framework
description: Establish a testing framework and infrastructure for unit testing, integration testing, and end-to-end testing of the PQRSTLearningAssistant tool.

title: Implement Testing
description: Write and execute tests for the backend, frontend, and overall system functionality, ensuring the tool meets the defined requirements.

title: Secure the Application
description: Perform security audits, implement security best practices, and ensure the application is secure against potential threats and vulnerabilities.

title: Deploy and Manage Infrastructure
description: Set up and manage the infrastructure required for hosting and running the PQRSTLearningAssistant tool, including servers, databases, and any necessary third-party services.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the PQRSTLearningAssistant tool, including user guides, developer guides, and any other relevant documentation.
